@RunOnFlux @Antreas_4 @chrimboA @Cointelegraph @Minima_Global A fully validating and constructing node. Equal to all others. No third parties (miners, external validators, producers, etc). Everyone running the same version. No hierarchy. No point of centralization. It's the future. Now.

@Antreas_4 @chrimboA @Cointelegraph @RunOnFlux @Minima_Global With Minima anyone can run complete nodes on their phone. Simple as using any other app. That's probably why the node count is growing exponentially üëç

@rigduud @Cointelegraph @RunOnFlux Complete decentralization in this context describes a network where every single node is equal. Complete and validating. That's @Minima_Global üëç but it's good that others are at least aiming in that direction too. Key is to ensure equality and freedom.
